name: musicMove
description:
!!!epilepsy warning!!! Frequently chaining colours might be too much for some people!

musicMove is a 2D platformer that will have a close look at your choice of music. Depending on that you will have a unique experience. You can use you own music by placing it in the "externalmusic" folder of the game.

Your goal is it to reach the end of the level, going left or right and reach the goal (a bigger green block).
It has to be a ".wav" file though. You can convert it by using programs like ffmpeg ( https://ffmpeg.org/ ).

Controls: 
WASD - movment
space - jump
r - reset position to start
esc - quit
